modName: WWLMG - Word Wall Learning More Glorious
summary: Adds animations when learing new Shout Words from a Word Wall.
descriptionHtml:
[size=12][u][b]WWLMG - Word Wall Learning More Glorious[/b][/u][/size]

[u][b]Description[/b][/u]

[b]What does this do?[/b]
This mod contains edited Word Wall scripts that have small animation sequences
added to. If you go to a Word Wall and learn a new shout word you will see an
animation.

[b]Does it do something else?[/b]
While playing the animation and learning the new word your character will go
into God Mode, it also disables the control over your character while it plays.
This ensures that you will not be killed by a horde of draugr or a dragon while
walking near a Word Wall, although they can surround you.

[b]I can't interact with a Word Wall![/b]
The interaction with the Word Wall is the same as it was intended by Bethesda.
My stuff only does its job when an interaction is detected.

[b]There is no ESM/ESP, did I screw something up?[/b]
This mod only contains scripts, there is no master nor a plugin file.

[b]Sidenote: Mixing animations[/b]
Generally you can mix Animations by overwriting just a few scripts instead of all. But you should keep in mind that Beth not always used the DB Word Wall script for the DB Word Walls, just as an example.

[u][b]Requirements[/b][/u]

Skyrim
Dawnguard (optional)
Dragonborn (optional)

Scripts are compiled with the latest version of the CK, you will need the latest Skyrim version.
Source files are included, if you want to use it with an earlier version you can compile the scripts yourself.

[u][b]Installation[/b][/u]

See the Readme

[u][b]Uninstallation[/b][/u]

See the Readme

[u][b]Updating[/b][/u]

Just replace the old scripts with the new ones.

[u][b]Compatibility[/b][/u]

Unofficial Patches 2.0.1 (included and also usable without Unofficial Patches)

[u][b]Incompatibilities[/b][/u]

Non I know right now

[u][b]Troubleshooting[/b][/u]

1. IF NMM OR YOUR FILE MANAGER ASKS YOU TO OVERWRITE A .PEX FILE IT MAY BE A SIGN THAT YOU ALREADY HAVE MODS EDITING THE WORD WALLS, WHICH MEANS THERE COULD BE INCOMPATIBILITIES BETWEEN THIS MOD AND ANOTHER. PLEASE GO TO THE COMMENT SECTION AND POST THE NAME OF THE SCRIPT AND FROM WHAT MOD IT IS, NMM WILL TELL YOU THAT AUTOMATICLLY, WHEN YOU HAVE INSTALLED THE OTHER MOD THROUGH NMM, TOO. IF YOU DO A MANUAL INSTALLATION YOU HAVE TO FIND THE MOD THAT HAS PLACED THE FILE THERE YOURSELF. DON'T SIMPLY OVERWRITE THEM, IF YOU AREN'T SURE WHAT YOU DO.
!NO SCRIPT NAME AND/OR NO MOD NAME IN THE BUG REPORT WILL RESULT IN ME WRITING "IDC" (I DON'T CARE)! !!!I'M NOT A PSYCHIC!!! ^^

2. IF YOU FIND A .BSA FILE, WITH A .PEX SCRIPT WITH THE SAME NAME AS THE ONE I EDITED WHICH IS NOT IN THE COMPATIBILITY LIST PLEASE REPORT THEM IN THE COMMENTS, IT MAY BE AN INCOMPATIBILITY. NO SCRIPT AND MOD NAME BLAH BLAH SEE ABOVE.^^

[u][b]Recommendations[/b][/u]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13850/]DSAMG - Dragon Soul Absorb More Glorious by JonoPhoenix[/url] [[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35762]Dragonborn Version[/url]]
Add animations and sounds to Dragon Soul Absorb.

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33914/]YY Anim Replacer - Mystic Knight by yukl[/url]
Requirment for the DSAMG Ritual Spell - YY - Patch and MSAMG.

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37416/]Visual Improvement for Absorb Effect Darkness by michaelrw[/url]
For people who are annoyed by the blackscreen while absorbing. (some ENB can brighten up that blackscreen screen, too, if you want to spare a plugin slot)

[u][b]Permissions[/b][/u]

See the Permission tab

[u][b]Credits[/b][/u]

Bethesda
- The scripts this is based on.
JonoPhoenix - DSAMG - Dragon Soul Absorb More Glorious
- based on his animation sequences
Osmanli
- suggesting the idea for this mod
Unofficial Patch Project Team
- fixing the bug in the world wall scripts for Vanilla, DG and DB
